 2012-05772012-05-03,  CIC,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of JOANNA M.T. BEDARD of Brantford, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of ten months or a period expiring on the day prior to the coming into force of the Balanced Refugee Reform Act, whichever period ends earlier, effective May 4, 2012.
